name: IAM
description: Identity and Access Management — secure control of AWS resources.
backend: Validates user key rotation, MFA enforcement, and policy compliance.

name: Cognito
description: User authentication and identity federation service.
backend: Simulates login throughput and user pool availability metrics.

name: KMS
description: Key Management Service — manages encryption keys securely.
backend: Monitors key usage and rotation schedules.

name: GuardDuty
description: Threat detection and continuous monitoring service.
backend: Tracks new findings, anomaly detection, and alert events.

name: WAF
description: Web Application Firewall — filters malicious web traffic.
backend: Simulates blocked requests and rule evaluation delays.
